Yes, I am interested in presenting a workshop.

Pedagogical Possibilities in ICT

In this session teachers will explore a variety of easy to use tech tools that will enhance pedagogical practices, and actively engage students in learning. Inspired and informed, participants will be motivated to implement fresh ideas for using Nearpod, Kahoot, Wizer Me, Plickers and Zaption in their own learning environments. Participants should bring a connected device.

  • Workshop Date: Dec 17, 2016
